original: Häggström, Hugo Robert, arkitekt SAR, Borås, f. 10/4/02 i Borås av Anders Peter H. o. Augusta Kristina Qvist. G. 34 m. Iris Olson. Barn: Matti f. 37, Jonas 41, Steffen 43. — Stud:ex. i Borås 21, avg:ex..fr. KTH 25. Anst. h. arkit. B. Hedvall 26-32, v. Byggn. A-B Ekdahl & Lindner 32-33, h. arkit. S. Wallander v. HSB i Sthlm 33-34, egen arkit :verksamh. i. Borå’S sed. 34, stadsarkit. i Ulricehamn 44-45. Led. av Sv. tekn:fören. sed. 26. Imk. v. tävl rvidilöo: f. Byigge 0. Bo, St him, 25, Katarina Realskola, Sthlm, 28, Tegelbacken, Sthlm, 29. Första pris Borås Sparbank 41.
translated: Häggström, Hugo Robert, architect SAR, Borås, b. 10/4/02 in Borås to Anders Peter H. and Augusta Kristina Qvist. Married in 1934 to Iris Olson. Children: Matti b. 1937, Jonas b. 1941, Steffen b. 1943. Obtained high school diploma in Borås in 1921 and graduated from KTH in 1925. Employed by architect B. Hedvall from 1926-1932, by construction company A-B Ekdahl & Lindner from 1932-1933, and as an architect by S. Wallander for HSB in Stockholm from 1933-1934. Established his own architectural practice in Borås in 1934 and served as city architect in Ulricehamn from 1944-1945. Member of Swedish Technical Association since 1926. Awarded first prize by Borås Savings Bank in 1941.
